results.content:
The course is a good introduction to the three languages.  If you come into it with no "vocabulary" you will at least leave with a basic understanding of syntax and structure. 

The half off from a 5 star is because the instructor goes way too fast.  Its hard to nearly impossible to duplicate what he is doing at times if you want to mimic so you can see for yourself.  By the time the Javascript modules start, he is flying.  So that part got frustrating. It was not a deal killer though.  I got my money's worth.

By the time the Javascript modules start, he is flying. So that part got frustrating. It was not a deal killer though. I got my money's worth.

response.content: Thank you for the suggestion, Manish. As per udemy policy, a free course can have less than 2 hrs of content. So I have tried to cover all the basics. In case you think any important topic is left out, please mention and I'll update it.
